name: Turtleneck Reversible Dress
description:
Why have 1 dress when you can have 2? That's right, 2 dresses in one! YOU pick the color(s)/print(s). The length hits just below the knee. 

***Email requesting color(s)/print and measurements will be sent after payment is received. 
 
What's the return policy?

Because each garment is made to order, refunds/exchanges are not accepted. Please make sure you provide accurate measurements to ensure your apparel fits properly. Viktory Kouture assumes no responsibility for inaccurate measurements provided by the customer. If you have ANY questions, please contact me at vik@viktorykouture.com BEFORE placing an order. If you need an order rushed, a rush fee will be incurred. 

How long will it take to receive my order?

Viktory Kouture is custom, made to order apparel. Please allow 7-14 business days for tees and 15-30 business days for all other apparel.

name: Custom Sewing
description:
My rate is $25/hr with a 2 hour minimum NOT including fabric, pattern and/or notions. If you prefer that I purchase materials, an extra fee will be incurred. A $50 non refundable deposit is due prior to any work beginning and the balance must be paid prior to order being released to client. All orders not picked up within a week of completion will incur a $5/day service fee. If orders are not picked up within 30 days of completion, they will become property of Viktory Kouture.

name: Custom Tshirt Design
description:
PLEASE READ IN ITS ENTIRETY & EMAIL ME @ vik@viktorykouture.com IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS. 

Have a custom t-shirt idea you'd like to see brought to life?
My non refundable design fee is $35 and will serve as a deposit on your apparel. I will provide you with (3) designs to select from. Once you decide on a design, you will be provided (2) revisions of that design. Should you require more than that, additional fees will be charged. 

Apparel varies in pricing due to quality, style and color. I will provide you with a quote of your custom design on apparel after all of the aforementioned has been decided upon. 

Please note that my logo will be affixed to the front and/or back of the garment(s). 

EXCLUSIVE RIGHTS: Once files have been electronically transmitted, Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC reserves the right to use any Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo design for portfolio showcase. Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC reserves the right to utilize the design for any other company or person henceforth. Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC can reproduce, alter, or utilize the design in any commercial venture. Any design modifications necessary from Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo., LLC will incur a separate design fee. 
All files will be transferred within 24 hours of posted payment.
SO….WHAT’S THAT MEAN? IN A NUTSHELL, I HAVE THE RIGHT TO REUSE THE DESIGN I CREATED FOR MY OWN PURPOSES INCLUDING RESALE TO ANY OTHER ENTITY AND AS A SAMPLING OF MY BODY OF WORK. 

NON EXCLUSIVE RIGHTS: All design files are to be transferred, with rights and complete ownership, from Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC to you upon receipt of non refundable, non exclusive rights payment ($150). Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC agrees to never utilize the design for any other company or person henceforth. You may reproduce, alter, or utilize the design in any commercial venture without license from Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC. Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC does reserve the right to use any Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo design for portfolio showcase. Once files have been electronically transmitted, any design modifications necessary from Viktory Kouture by Vik VarWoo, LLC will incur a separate design fee. 
All files will be transferred within 24 hours of posted payment.
SO…WHAT’S THAT MEAN? IN A NUTSHELL, I'VE BASICALLY CREATED A LOGO SO ONCE YOU PAY FOR THE DESIGN IT IS YOURS TO DO WITH AS YOU PLEASE. I CANNOT AND WILL NOT USE IT FOR ANY OTHER CLIENT BUT I WILL USE IT TO DISPLAY IN MY BODY OF WORK. 

REFUND/EXCHANGE POLICY: Because apparel is custom, there are no refunds and if an exchange is necessary, the client will be charged for the cost of replacement.
